product: WSO2 API Manager, WSO2 Identity Server, WSO2 Identity Server as Key Manager
shortDescription: The SOAP admin service in WSO2 products has a security vulnerability that allows the creation of new user accounts regardless of the self-registration configuration settings.
vulnerabilityName: WSO2 User Registration Arbitrary Account Creation
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
